title: Publishers - AI Book Recommender
description: A full-stack web application that helps authors find the perfect publishers for their books using AI-powered recommendations. Built with Next.js 15, Flask, and machine learning, it features JWT authentication, PDF upload with text extraction, a 3-step recommendation wizard, and real-time publisher matching. The system uses TF-IDF and genre detection algorithms to analyze manuscripts and match them with 294+ publishers. Includes comprehensive recommendation scoring based on genre, text similarity, and regional preferences.

title: DeepDoc - AI PDF Chat System
description: An AI-powered PDF question-answering system that lets users chat with their documents. Built with Python, ChromaDB vector database, and Google Gemini AI. Features include intelligent PDF text extraction, semantic search using sentence transformers, confidence scoring, source attribution, and a beautiful Streamlit interface. The system processes PDFs into searchable chunks, stores them as vector embeddings, and retrieves relevant context for accurate AI-generated answers. Deployed with Docker support and production-ready API.
